Excellent Mexican takeout. We had the Chicken Enchiladas, which was quite good. The Tilapia was quite good as well.

This is honestly the best Mexican restaurant  I have try  so far. They never fail me. Food is always fresh, colorful and tasty.  I honestly travel from far for their food. My favorite dish as you can see on the picture I posted are the tostadas,  tacos  and burritos.  I highly recommend this spot with my eyes close.
